raw: * This module provides basic IO functionality. It contains three ways to load

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This module provides basic IO functionality. It contains three ways to load data:

  • XMLHttpRequest
  • Script tag
  • Script tag using JSONP

* @param url {String} Mandatory URL to load the data from.
* @param settings {Map?} Optional settings map which may contain one of

*
  • method The method of the request. Default: GET

*
  • async flag to mark the request as asynchronous. Default: true

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a configured XMLHttpRequest object. Using the send method will finally send the request.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: url {String} Mandatory URL to load the data from.
@param.description: Mandatory URL to load the data from.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
settings {Map?} Optional settings map which may contain one of the following settings:
  • method The method of the request. Default: GET
  • async flag to mark the request as asynchronous. Default: true
  • header A map of request headers.
@param.description:
Optional settings map which may contain one of the following settings:
  • method The method of the request. Default: GET
  • async flag to mark the request as asynchronous. Default: true
  • header A map of request headers.

raw: * Returns a predefined script tag wrapper which can be used to load data
* @param url {String} Mandatory URL to load the data from.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a predefined script tag wrapper which can be used to load data from cross-domain origins.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: url {String} Mandatory URL to load the data from.
@param.description: Mandatory URL to load the data from.

raw: * Returns a predefined script tag wrapper which can be used to load data
* @param url {String} Mandatory URL to load the data from.
* @param settings {Map?} Optional settings map which may contain one of
* * callbackName: The name of the callback which will
*      be called by the loaded script.
* * callbackParam: The name of the callback expected by the server

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a predefined script tag wrapper which can be used to load data from cross-domain origins via JSONP.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: url {String} Mandatory URL to load the data from.
@param.description: Mandatory URL to load the data from.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: settings {Map?} Optional settings map which may contain one of the following settings: * callbackName: The name of the callback which will be called by the loaded script. * callbackParam: The name of the callback expected by the server
